text: The Vyritsa concentration camp was a Nazi concentration camp that was established September of 1942, in Vyritsa, Russia (back then Russian SFSR, Soviet Union.). It was closed down in 1943, presumably due to the Soviet advance. Many inmates had died in the camp from a prolonged and severe state of deep malnutrition and/or even starvation. Category:Concentration camps
title: Vyritsa concentration camp
